ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgacs.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_issubrg3 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( x e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` R ) /\ x e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elin | |- ( x e. ( ( SubGrp ` R ) i^i ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) <-> ( x e. ( SubGrp ` R ) /\ x e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( x e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> x e. ( ( SubGrp ` R ) i^i ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` R ) = ( ( SubGrp ` R ) i^i ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 9 |  | #P_mreacs | |- ( B e. _V -> ( ACS ` B ) e. ( Moore ` ~P B ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mp1i | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ACS ` B ) e. ( Moore ` ~P B ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_subgacs | |- ( R e. Grp -> ( SubGrp ` R ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubGrp ` R ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 14 | 2 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd ) |
| 15 | 2, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_submacs | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd -> ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_mreincl | |- ( ( ( ACS ` B ) e. ( Moore ` ~P B ) /\ ( SubGrp ` R ) e. ( ACS ` B ) /\ ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) -> ( ( SubGrp ` R ) i^i ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 19 | 10, 13, 17, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( SubGrp ` R ) i^i ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` R ) e. ( ACS ` B ) ) |
